bwwExcerpt: The show has been updated to include a few new zingers. For instance, God announces that he knows full well that the crowd is only there because they couldn't get tickets to "Hamilton." In fact, God can't snag a ticket, either. Even at just 90 minutes, "An Act of God" (directed by the prolific Joe Mantello) is long-winded and full of unoriginal jabs at easy targets, but it is cute and occasionally witty .
